Summary: There was a big cloud formation I was watching and observed the craft come out of or above the cloud.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Reno
There were no other sightings in Reno on or around April 1st 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching a big wispy cloud then i noticed something coming out of or above the cloud then pointed it out to girlfriend,mother and her boyfriend who all watched it with me.The craft was highly refractive as it appeared to work its way from north to south across the sky and also gaining elevation.No noise was present.I watched the object till it started looking like a star in the sky and then it was gone i don't know if it just vanished it was beyond my vision range the thing lasted about 10 min more or less.My thoughts are that if this is a prototype or black project its not very covert in daylight above a decent size population or the occupants of the craft don't care if their seen.
